All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
App is the main class that gets everything done- reads the arguments, creates a website class, calls the analysis function, then calls the output function.
CLI
For Command Line Interface Output, currently only used to output json, text, and excel file names
CSS
class for holding all data related to a CSS file for storing inside the Website class
Excel
Excel class for preparing and outputting Excel sheet displaying analysis information.
Image
Class to hold data for each individual image found in website analysis directory
JavaScript
Class to hold information of each Javascript file found in analysis
JSON
stores information of JSON files
Link
Class to store all internal, external, or intra-site links found by analysis
OtherFile
Class to hold relevant characteristics of each individual "Other" file, either Archive, Video, Audio, or Uncategorized files
OtherFile.fileType
enumeration type for ARCHIVE, VIDEO, AUDIO, or UNCATEGORIZED files
OutputPackager
The purpose of OutputPackager is to call the JSON, Text, Excel, and CLI output functions and output .JAR file with completed code and 2 executables (Windows and Linux/OSX) Also possibly outputs errors to CLI if not caused by user (if caused by user, that output is handled by Website class
Page
Page class to hold all information and references of a single .html page in the website
Text
This class is called by OutputPackager and retrieves info from Website, Pages, and others in order to output a .txt file
Website
Website class to perform analysis of entire directory and store information in separate collections
